#summary Smooth resize of the first panel column (с) Maximus5

 * [Shell Shell Macros]

=== Description ===

  Smooth resize of the first panel column (this is the file name, usually).

  # *Ctrl+Alt+Left* -  Narrowing column width
  # *Ctrl+Alt+Right* — Widening column width
  # *Ctrl+Alt+Clear* — Reset column to the original width

 Attention: This macros requires english or russian Far interface language.
